page.title: 19FARMING
page.content: There are quite a few farms around Ashover,some are dairy farms and some are beef farms.Willmots have a farm their farm is a dairy farm.We have a farm but we farm for beef.There is someone up the road from us who still milks his cows by hand.Ashover has quite a few farms round it and theres quite a bit of farm land round Ashover as well.Here are some peoples names that have farms around the district of Ashover_:Austin's,Bonsall's,Bradley's, Montague's,Bown's,Tomlinson's,Beardow' s,Homle's,Holes and Hinchley.These people have been here for many years. Most people dairy farm in and around Ashover.Farms usually have labourers (that means to work there).In the early days farmers didn't have tractors and things like that,they had horses instead.Things have really changed since the old days.
